system.description: When you go to your sanctum for a spell ingredient, relic, or tome, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you don’t have what you’re looking for, but you know someone from another Circle who probably has it in stock.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a 7-9, you’ve got something close, but it’s flawed or lacking in some significant way.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value: On a 10+, you’ve got pretty much just the thing.
